dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Bacon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 37, United States Code, to increase certain bonus and incentive pays for certain members of the uniformed services.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Military Bonus and Special Pay Increase Act of 2022.

section.header: Increase to maximum amounts of certain bonus and special pay authorities

subsection.header: General bonus authority for enlisted members
subsection.text: Section 331(c)(1) of title 37, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking $50,000 and inserting $75,000; and
in subparagraph (B), by striking $30,000 and inserting $50,000.

subsection.header: Special bonus and incentive pay authorities for nuclear officers
subsection.text: Section 333(d)(1)(A) of title 37, United States Code, is amended by striking $50,000 and inserting $75,000.

subsection.header: Special aviation incentive pay and bonus authorities for officers
subsection.text: Section 334(c)(1) of title 37, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking $1,000 and inserting $1,500; and
in subparagraph (B), by striking $35,000 and inserting $75,000.

subsection.header: Skill incentive pay or proficiency bonus
subsection.text: Section 353(c)(1)(A) of title 37, United States Code, is amended by striking $1,000 and inserting $1,750.
